items.title: HUL Shares: SEBI Analyst Flags Bullish Call, Says Stock Is Best Placed To Benefit From GST 2.0
items.description: The GST Council’s new two-slab regime is set to cut prices of essentials and fuel FMCG demand.

items.title: Swiggy Makes Food Delivery More Expensive Ahead Of Festive Season
items.description: Swiggy raised its food delivery platform fee to ₹15 per order, a third hike in three weeks

items.title: GST Relief For Buyers: Alto And Wagon R To Get Cheaper, Says Maruti Chairman RC Bhargava
items.description: The cars fall in the sub-1200 cc category, which will benefit from a GST cut to 18% from 28%

items.title: Oil Prices Slip On Concerns Of OPEC+ Supply Boost In October
items.description: Benchmark Brent crude prices fell 0.6% to $67.21 per barrel, while U.S. West Texas Intermediate prices fell 0.7% to $63.53 per barrel at 4.35 a.m. ET.

items.title: SEBI vs Jane Street: US-based Trading Firm Files Appeal Seeking Key Documents In Market Manipulation Case
items.description: SEBI had barred Jane Street from participating in the Indian securities market in July, alleging market manipulation
